posts.post_title: FS: SGC 60 Hugh Jennings (both hands) Cycle 460
posts.post_content: Near impossible front/back combo, PSA has only one graded total (PSA 4). Card is well centered, very sharp for the grade. Please send me your email for pics, beautiful card. $1500 delivered, thanks..
